author: Jonathan Randles
title: Weinstein Co. to File for Bankruptcy as Part of Deal With Lantern Capital
text:
Dallas-based investment firm Lantern Capital has struck a deal to purchase the assets of the film and TV studio co-founded by Harvey Weinstein in a transaction that requires the troubled entertainment company to file for bankruptcy.
Weinstein Co. filed for chapter 11 protection late Monday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del., following failed attempts by management and its board to avoid bankruptcy. The studio faces several lawsuits over allegations of sexual misconduct against Mr. Weinstein, who was fired by...
